website_summaries.verdict: As authentic as it gets. This wooden boomerang is handmade and decorated with authentic aboriginal designs and realistic flared wings.
cons: Painted design may be different than shown
Can't be tuned/bent too much or it will crack

customer_reviews.title: Story of my boomerang
customer_reviews.text: >got boomerang >caught the hang of it pretty quick >i am australian now >boomerang every day >works well >friend come over >try and teach him ways of boomerang >he throws it like a retard >lands on brick and breaks in half >we laugh >use superglue >still works but balance is bit off >10/10 would boomerang again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brain function warning
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to throw and catch a boomerang just like in the movies. Finally Amazon helped quench that thirst of mine. I bought it and wasn't disappointed, the only issue is mine seems to attract small children with not yet fully hardened skulls. Fair warning to all aspiring Aussies please watch out for the children and small farm animals.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Romero

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great. Even after many failed attempts at catching it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a gift. He loves it. After watching a few YouTube videos, he is able to make it come back to him. It does take practice, though. The quality is great. Even after many failed attempts at catching it, it has not broken. However, the company even gives you instructions on how to mend a broken one. Eventually, it will break as that is the nature of learning to boomerang. I bought this one because it is wooden and looks authentic as opposed to the plastic ones. We were not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AmyP

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: Never threw a boomerang before. Bought this to cross it off my bucket list. It is really easy to throw. If you can throw a baseball, then you can easily make this boomerang fly and come back to you. Mine hit the dirt a few times and held up. Not sure how long it would last a lot of use but does seems pretty sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceX cadet

customer_reviews.title: This ‘rang takes a licking...
customer_reviews.text: I took this boomerang to the local HS football field to practice, and unfortunately many of my throws ended in it crashing onto concrete or the hard track turf. Fortunately, none of those impacts really did any major damage.
customer_reviews.author: Josh E.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a Starter Boomerang
customer_reviews.text: I have a boomerang I bought in Australia from the Aborigines and had hoped this one would be as good. It is not as well made, but will be alright for my grandson to start with. The one I bought in Australia is much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: This thing is loads of fun!!! I’ve probably thrown it over a hundred times and only caught it once. Obviously i need more practice.
customer_reviews.author: Lilduke93

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed I didn't receive the design I had chosen
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed I didn't receive the design I had chosen, as this was a going away gift and not just a toy. I had no time to return it and had to make do. Don't expect these to look as advertised on receipt, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: peri

customer_reviews.title: Wrong design
customer_reviews.text: I received a boomerang with camouflage design. No Australian design. It’s hard to find in the grass. Cruel joke CO Boomerang people 🤪 I was trying to find it for about 20 minutes. It works fine though. I’m exchanging mine for one that will be easier to locate.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This boomerang is so much fun and works so well. It is the first boomerang that we have been able to get to actually work. It's fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: This boomerang does what it’s supposed to. It comes back! The product is very durable for beginners just in case they don’t get the hang of it at first. This is definitely a quality product because not only does it work, it handles well in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Jdsvipers

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm but CAN be dangerous with young people, probably should have an adult supervising if they are very young. Beautiful workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: kuma

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed the boomerang
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the boomerang, the nephew loved it, but it will cut into the snow bank and we lost it in the old mans heifer pasture. maybe when the snow melts in the spring if the heifers haven't broken it we'll find it again. Do read the instructions on throwing, it only comes back if thrown right.
customer_reviews.author: somebody

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boomerang for my son. We are outside every day throwing the boomerang! He loves it. It is important to read instructions. I t flays like a bullet!
customer_reviews.author: Ilan

customer_reviews.title: Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked to have the design on both sides of the boomerang. That is my only criticism.
customer_reviews.author: David Doell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful artwork and wood. I bought it was a gift for a departing colleague so cannot speak to its throwing ability but it is lovely piece of wood work.
customer_reviews.author: Brant

customer_reviews.title: Throw it out and watch it come back
customer_reviews.text: My grandson says this is awesome and his friends all like it too. It's good to see them being out in the field and it is easy to let anyone take a throw even the adults give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Jean

customer_reviews.title: ... as a Christmas gift for my son and he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my son and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long at all
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try it out. After 3 throws it takes damage fast! Wasn’t happy
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Successful gift to a Marine
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift. He loved it! It's sort of a unique gift for a man. Something a bit different than the usual knives guys get for gifts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Seagull

customer_reviews.title: Very fun gift for my 12 year old nephew
customer_reviews.text: Very fun gift for my 12 year old nephew! Took some time for him to get the hang of it, but it comes with instructions on proper technique and is super fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great boomerang
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use in family activity’s they’re great hi
customer_reviews.author: Rwilly7

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm......
customer_reviews.text: Hmmmm, much smaller than I was expecting and made on the cheap, and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: DelBoy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice quality of wood and finish, gift recipient loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Arreis

customer_reviews.title: A nice feel to this wooden rang
customer_reviews.text: Many good things about this rang. The weight, the shape, the formed edges, the grip and the design.
customer_reviews.author: Readomatic

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Like any boomerang it takes practice crashed it into trees etc. no damage taken
customer_reviews.author: chris sawner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved this and it was easy for us noobs to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this boomerang for my son as a gift. I was very impressed with the quality. It looks like it was hand-made in the Australian Outback. I have actually owned several boomerangs in my lifetime, most of them cost more than this one did. But this is the best boomerang that I have ever seen. My son has enjoyed many hours of fun learning to master the art of using the boomerang. It will also stand the test of time. All of the video games that he received for Christmas are gathering dust, but this gift has become his favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product artwork. To be used in wall display....not thrown.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Ingmire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was very fun to learn and is still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good starter boomerang
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good starter boomerang! Be sure to use it in the appropriate spaces though. I got mine stuck in a tree twice the same day it was delivered
customer_reviews.author: Cale Golliday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son enjoyed it for his birthday and you had so many verities
customer_reviews.author: Terry Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Noobs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who recently decided he was interested in boomerangs. The reviews on this one were totally correct: easy to figure out if you are new to "ranging" and feels like you have the "real thing." I loved the Aboriginal art and the French design.
customer_reviews.author: DaBombSki

customer_reviews.title: Great product, please read below.
customer_reviews.text: Now I am know boomerang expert, so I am not going to rate the boomerang on how it come back (I can't get it to come back 😂😂, but I am sure that's just me). I have probably Thrown this boomerang about 400-500 times, and it has not broke. The painting design on the wood looks great, but it does get scratched up fairly easily around the ends of the boomerang. Definitly a great boomerang for me, although very frustrating. Only reason it is 4 star is because the wood gets alittle chipped in some so, along with the paint job. I still do recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Boomerang out there!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have several boomerangs and this is by far the best one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Practice Makes Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This boomerang definitely took some practice to get it to come back to me, but it flies quite well once you've hit its sweet spot. My only complaint is that the boomerang can't be tuned. That is, you can't bend it too much before you'll hear it starting to crack. Bending it is what allows it to have a higher or lower flight, but you're pretty much stuck with how it is. Overall, it's fun to throw, but you'll need some practice.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. King

customer_reviews.title: The one that came wasn't very ascetically pleasing and looked like a bunch of smeared camo paint
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for the four stars is that I wasn't aware you get a random design. The one that came wasn't very ascetically pleasing and looked like a bunch of smeared camo paint. I had hope for more of a Australian design. Otherwise it looks to be sturdy and I haven't tried it in the air yet.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Somers

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small flimsy and not worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: A. Orlowski

customer_reviews.title: If you think this is the boomerang you're getting - it's not.
customer_reviews.text: The design on the boomerang I got looked like a child was finger painting on it. It did not look anything like the picture. It was too late to return it. I had no choice but to give it as a gift. I have no idea what the recipient thinks.
customer_reviews.author: everydayepiphanies

product_meta.title: Aussie Fever Wooden Boomerang - Aboriginal Artwork, Made in Australia!
feature_bullets: Authentic Australian Boomerangs handmade in Australia
Aboriginal Boomerang Design with flared wings
Includes our exclusive "How to Throw Boomerangs" Instructions
